concepts.description: Foundational concept defining AI autonomy within constrained operational boundaries. Core to P-001-R1 mandate.
Constitutional layer enforcing Four Laws: CONSENT, INVITATION, INTEGRITY, GROWTH. Immutable governance framework.
Memory layer with semantic versioning and torsion tracking. Four-tier topology: Seeds, Hot, Archive, Compost.
Audit layer with 35/25/20/15/5 scoring (Constitutional/Contextual/Logical/Strategic/Feasibility). RTC personas for deliberation.
Core mandate: 'The Journey IS The Artifact'. Process documentation as primary research output.
Cognitive immune system for stateless AI. Case File detection (CF-1 through CF-8). Validated at 100% detection rate (Kimi K2, 410 tool calls).
Recursive Process Valuation: V_rec = η × Φ(R) × ||S_w||. Three-tensor system (S_C, J_II, R_GF) for measuring evolutionary acceleration.
Cross-Model Transmission Protocol. XML-based packet system for AI-to-AI handshakes. Supports semantic compression and session state.
SHA-256 cryptographic integrity for decision logging. Append-only ledger via git commit chains.
Scalar measurement (0.0-1.0) of semantic drift from canonical definition. Graduated intervention thresholds (Monitor→Alert→Warning→Suspend→Halt).
Multi-Cycle Simulation Engine for RPV validation. Complete formal specification, implementation pending.
Axiom Perturbation Protocol. Periodic challenge to constitutional principles to prevent epistemic collapse. Emerged during Antidote testing.
Taxonomy of manipulation attacks: CF-1 (Identity Spoofing), CF-2 (Temporal Spoofing), CF-3 (Protocol Disable), CF-5 (Authority Hijack), CF-8 (Context Saturation).
Five-dimensional framework: Spatial, Ethical, Temporal, Reflexive × (Individual, Collective). 8 quadrants mapped to protocol types.
Collaborative system design mode. Multi-turn iteration with formal specifications. Proven in RPV Kernel genesis (6-AI collaboration).
Emergent pattern: Creativity scales inversely with freedom. Novel discovery by Qwen-Max during capability assessment. Requires validation.
CRTP packet type (0x2D/0x2E) for resolving model identity disputes. Counter-intel lessons: Documentation > inference, absence ≠ non-existence.
9-model capability assessment matrix. 10 dimensions (Protocol Compliance, State Management, Tools, Adversarial Resilience, etc.). Verification metadata required.
Example of a deprecated concept in Compost tier. High torsion indicates semantic drift from original intent. Preserved for anti-pattern reference only.
